title: Naturopathic Medicine: I work myself out of a job.
description: At Simply Refined Health, my goal as a doctor is to work myself out of a job and help you get as healthy as possible and learn what works for your body so that eventually your lifestyle becomes your healthcare.
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Medicine takes the best of the world of medicine you are already familiar with and adds to it the capability of treating the body using natural means. While educated in pharmaceutical drugs, I am also extensively trained in nutrition, botanicals, hydrotherapy, acupuncture, homeopathy, and Biotherapeutic Drainage providing you many directions that you can approach your health journey with. Because there are so many different ways to achieve your goals, this allows you to personalize your healthcare and create a method that works for you and your schedule. Ultimately, the goal is to create the optimal cycle of your healthcare becoming your lifestyle. Your lifestyle will create health and your health will in turn preserve your lifestyle.
